step.cmd: For record-level resources with a base class of VisualItem (e.g., or ) that have associated language information, that information should be attached to the related HumanMadeObject or DigitalObject using the carries (HumanMadeObject) or digitally_carries (DigitalObject) property.
For top-level resources with a base class of Set (archival records or kits), language information should be attached to the embedded HumanMadeObject resource using the carries property.
